name: Fisherman: Fishing
description:
Hooked Tap Tap Fish is an addictive fishing game and an endless fish catching .
Fishing games are much popular among the fishing lovers so we are here with Fish Catching Master game – an ultimate fishing game offline for fishers.
Let’s try this fishing game free and start catching the fishes of many types.
Complete fishing game offline, earn points and purchase length, strength of fishing door, strength of fishing games hook for fast fishing!
